description: Currently all flag contents are written to logs in verbose mode without regard to if they are security sensitive (contain keys or passwords).
title: Do not write security sensitive flag values to verbose logs

comments.content: Currently all flag contents are written to logs in verbose mode without regard to if they are security sensitive (contain keys or passwords).
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~jogo

commit ec244a1d940d0dbe56527b290f4b5052fba96739
Author: Joe Gordon <email address hidden>
Date:   Thu Jan 12 14:29:06 2012 -0800

    Do not write passwords to verbose logs. bug 916167
    
    Look for _key and _password in flag names
